title: Kasa
subtitle: Creation of a front-end in React

content.text: For this project completed during my training, I had to create the entire front-end of the website in React. I had access to a backend with all the data that I needed to integrate into my front-end.
The site consists of a homepage, an About page, and a customized 404 error page. The pages for each property are dynamically generated from the backend data.
I also had the opportunity to create some automated tests with Vitest, an example of which you can see below.
